content: May 15 Transportation services company Penske Corp is exploring a sale of Truck-Lite Co LLC  in a deal that could value the maker of lighting  wiring harnesses and mirrors for trucks at close to $1 billion  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Penske Automotive Group Inc
title: Penske seeks $1 bln sale of Truck-Lite -sources
